page.title: 06CATTLE MARKET PRICES
page.content: {CHELFORD CATTLE MARKET PRICES} Extract from Sales Report. Monday 17th June, 1985. 375 calves at 9.00 am (means 375 calves have been entered for sale). Black Hereford bulls average Â£140, heifers ave Â£83;Red Hereford bulls ave 112,heifers ave 87; Freisian bulls ave 113,heifers ave 85;Charolais bulls ave 166, heifers ave 130. Dairy cattle 11.30am:this is a slightly smaller entry but of high quality, meeting a very high trade especially for in-calf heifers(heifers that are pregnant).Two in-calf Freisian heifers from a Chelford vendor raised Â£666 and Â£660.Here is a list of prices at 11.30am _ newly calved Freisian heifers ave Â£487.. newly calved Freisian cow ave Â£440.. in-calf Freisian heifers ave Â£621.
